About Me

I'm a Software Developer/3D Artist with a background in Computer Science. Skilled in Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, C#, and Blender. Experienced in crafting captivating software applications and 3D models. Committed to delivering exceptional results through clean and efficient code. Strong understanding of aesthetics and user experience. Explore my portfolio and let's bring your digital vision to life together!
